content: **knitted cloths with textured pattern in drops safran ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-322 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1 cloth measures approx 25 x 25 cm **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 65 pistachio 50 g colour 50 mint 50 g colour 63 sea green 1 cloth weighs approx 25 g needles drops singel pointed needles size 3 5 mm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
